options.title: Inputs
options.description: Every sound event has inputs. Inputs include microphones, instruments, laptops, phones, etc.

choices.title: Small
choices.detailPrompt: Please describe your microphone and laptop/phone input requirements.
choices.description: Music and up to 2 additional inputs. Great for speeches, and playing music with occasional announcements.

choices.title: Medium
choices.detailPrompt: Please describe your microphone and other input requirements, including any instruments/vocalists that need to be mic'ed, any DIs required, laptop input, etc.
choices.description: Music and up to 8 additional inputs. Great for panel discussions, a capella shows, and small on-stage performances.

choices.title: Large
choices.detailPrompt: Please describe your microphone and other input requirements, including any instruments/vocalists that need to be mic'ed, any DIs required, etc. If your event is a stage show with multiple acts, you will be asked for a set list via email and you only need to provide a general description here.
choices.description: Unlimited inputs. Great for bands, concerts, and large on-stage performances.

options.title: Speakers
options.description: Contact us if your event needs more than two main speakers, such as for surround sound or a large concert.

choices.title: House System
choices.description: Use the speakers built into the room. Only available in some locations.

choices.title: Small
choices.description: Two small speakers. Great for background music or speeches in a smaller space.

choices.title: Large
choices.description: A pair of speakers for an event in a large space with more people. Great for concerts, bands, and stage shows.

choices.title: Subwoofers
choices.description: Subwoofers add more bass. Great for concerts, bands, or just playing music.

choices.title: Stage Monitors
choices.description: Speakers for people on the stage. Highly recommended for bands and on-stage performances.

choices.title: Area Fills
choices.detailPrompt: Please describe your area fills requirements.
choices.description: Additional speakers to fill a large or oddly-shaped venue.

addons.title: Wireless Microphone
addons.description: Wireless microphones can easily be added to any input level, increasing flexibility for the performer and reducing stage clutter.

options.title: Stage Lighting
options.description: Illuminate your stage or performance area.

choices.title: Basic
choices.description: Stationary stage lighting that may be dimmed as necessary. Great for small on-stage events.

choices.title: Advanced
choices.description: Changing colors and moving lights. Great for larger events such as concerts or large on-stage performances.

options.title: Area Lighting
options.description: Lighting for an area other than a stage, such as a dance floor or dinner tables.

choices.title: Basic
choices.description: May be statically colored and dimmed as necessary. Great for lighting a few tables or small areas.

choices.title: Advanced
choices.description: Changing colors, moving lights, and effects. Great for dances.

choices.title: Uplighting
choices.detailPrompt: You may specify colors and/or placement of the uplighting if you have a preference.
choices.description: Uplighting to give your event an extra splash of color. Great for a wide variety of occasions.

choices.title: Haze
choices.description: Add fog to your event. Requires coordination with WPI Police for use indoors.

options.title: Rigging
options.description: Rigging involves hanging truss from the ceiling to allow for overhead mounting of lights.

choices.title: Basic
choices.description: A single length of truss. Often necessary for events in Alden, Harrington, Odeum, Recreation Center Courts, and the Quad.

choices.title: Advanced
choices.description: Multiple lengths of truss. Most often used for events in Alden and Harrington.

addons.title: Mirror Ball
addons.description: Also known as a disco ball.

addons.title: Strobe Lights
addons.description: Requires the event to have posted strobe light warnings.

addons.title: Truss-mounted Projector
addons.description: Hanging a projector from truss. The projector must be borrowed from the ATC.

choices.title: Power Distribution
choices.description: Heavy duty power distribution for your large equipment such as food warmers or power to many tables for attendees. Not necessary for small electronics that just need an extension cord.
